column4: My terminal is very slow when scrolling - what might be the reason?
When I scroll a man page in my terminal, its very laggy - what might cause this?
jp, i dont know - how could i figure out?
its not THAT bad, jp210168 - but its not smooth either. and i think it should scroll smoothly, even though its just an atom processor and onboard graphics.
yes jp210168
wow?
videochip?
definately not normal. try to nail it down: read xorg.log, disable compiz, use differen wm ...
plz describe precisly what is lagging. would moving any large window around lag?
ok but you really should TURN OFF compiz to rule it out
even without effect just the compositor could slow things down

in the appearance thing
jp210168 i turned off compiz and it sstill lags as much as before (when in fullscreen or maximized)
grep your xorg.log for EE and WW
